channel.title: CVE Feed for metagauss -- EventPrime – Events Calendar, Bookings and Tickets
channel.description: The latest CVEs for metagauss -- EventPrime – Events Calendar, Bookings and Tickets

item.title: CVE-2024-8369|2024-09-10T11:30:31.628Z -- metagauss -- eventprime%20%E2%80%93%20events%20calendar%2C%20bookings%20and%20tickets
item.description: The EventPrime – Events Calendar, Bookings and Tickets plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access to Private or Password-protected events due to missing authorization checks in all versions up to, and including, 4.0.4.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to view private or password-protected events.
